alert.note: Alert for Burnett; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 7:59PM CST until December 29 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. * WHERE...In Wisconsin, Burnett and Douglas Counties. In Minnesota, Pine, Carlton and South St. Louis, Central St. Louis and North St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Fond du Lac Band, the Mille Lacs Band, Lena Lake and, Hinckley areas and the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
